H0.text: In the acronym DEFRA, for what does the A stand. Administration

H1.text: In the acronym DEFRA, for what does the A stand. Agency

H2.text: In the acronym DEFRA, for what does the A stand. Authority

H3.text: In the acronym DEFRA, for what does the A stand. Affair

A4.text: The 'A' in DEFRA stands for 'Affairs' as stated in the full name 'Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs (Defra)'
